name: Cult Activity
description: A dangerous cult has been discovered operating in your kingdom.

criticalSuccess.msg: You convert the cultists to a productive faith. They become valuable citizens.

success.msg: You successfully disband the cult and arrest its leaders.

failure.msg: The cult evades your forces and continues recruiting.

criticalFailure.msg: The cult's influence spreads! They gain powerful supporters.

modifierTemplate.name: Cult Influence
modifierTemplate.description: The cult continues to spread its dark influence, corrupting citizens and undermining authority

automatic.description: Build a temple to counter the cult's influence

onResolution.successMsg: The cult has been disbanded and its members dispersed!
onResolution.failureMsg: The cult continues to operate in the shadows

escalatedModifier.name: Cult Uprising
escalatedModifier.description: The cult has grown powerful and is now actively working to overthrow the government
